Detailed Description

Mob2D_node: This is basically a smart pointer to a stored Sprite resource with extra methods thrown in. It is used to provide access to the Sprite data. A game object holding onto an initialized Mob2DNode is GUARANTEED to point to a valid instance of this until that said game instance is deallocated.

Member Data Documentation

bool mob2d_node::draw [protected]

Flag denoting whether or not to animate the node, also whether or not to draw the node. In addition, if the draw_to_screen flag is set, it will use its coordinates as screen coordinates.
